Your peaceful companion for reading, memorizing, and listening to the Holy Quran.

Download AppExplore Features

Everything You Need for Your Quran Journey

Thoughtfully designed features to make reading, listening, and memorizing the Quran a beautiful experience.

All Surahs & Juz

Complete Quran with all 114 Surahs and 30 Juz organized for easy access.

Bookmark & Last Read

Save your place and continue reading from where you left off anytime.

Audio Recitation

Listen to beautiful recitations from multiple renowned Qaris worldwide.

Hafezi Mode

Memorization-friendly mode with repeat, reveal, and progress tracking.

Smart Search

Search by Surah name, Ayah number, or Para to find any verse instantly.

Night Mode

Comfortable dark reading experience for late night Quran sessions.

Experience the Beauty of Hudaa

A clean, distraction-free interface designed to help you focus on the words of Allah.

Simple Steps to Start

Get started with your Quran journey in minutes.

Step 1

Download & Install

Get the app from your store and install it on your device in seconds.

Step 2

Choose Your Reciter

Select from our list of world-renowned Qaris to listen to your favorite recitation style.

Step 3

Start Reading

Begin reading, listening, or memorizing with our easy-to-use tools.
